text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Ekiar angamɨra itim, kɨ uan ziamɨn guizbangɨra mɨgei, kɨ ian arazir kuraba ikarvagham. Ia Israelian aghuagha men atara navir kuram men ikia pazavɨra me gami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ arazir kurar kabara ikarvagh, dar ivezir kuram isɨ ia danɨngam. Kɨ tuavir kamɨn uabɨ isɨ Israelia akakaghtɨ, me nan arazir kɨ ia gasɨghasɨghamimɨn ganɨva, deravɨra na gɨfogham.
